alert.note: Alert for Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Yuma County through 300 PM MST... At 229 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ligurta, or near Fortuna Foothills, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fortuna Foothills and Ligurta. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 11 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila River Valley; Southeast Yuma County; Yuma
